rukus.text: hananim-i dawisgwa sollomon-ege jihyeleul jumae geudeul-i malhagil mid-eum i manh-eun geubun-ui jongdeulboda jeohuie ge eunhyeleul deohayeo jusin hananimkke gamsaleul deulinaida
sollomon-i dawis-eul sangsoghago malhagil baegseongdeul-iyeo ulineun saedeul-ui mal-eul baewoss-eumyeo modeun eunhyeleul bad-ass euni igeos-eun bunmyeonghan hananim-eulobu teoui eunhyela
yeongmawa ingangwa saedeul-ui muli ga sollomon ap-e daeyeol-eul jiyeo gaggag byeolgaeui jibdan-eul guseonghayeossnola

geudeul-i gaemiui gyegog-e ileu leoss-eul ttae hanmaliui gaemiga malhagil gaemideul-a sollomongwa geuui gundaega kkaedadji moshago ulideul-eul balb-a jug iljido moleuni ulideul geojujilo deul-eogaja hadeola

sollomon-eun gaemiui mal-e us-eum eul teoteulimyeo malhagil juyeo jeowa jeo ui bumo-ege bepul-eo jun dangsiui eunhyee gamsahadolog heoyonghayeo jusoseodangsinkkeseo jeolo hayeogeum gippeohaneun seonhaeng-eul hadolog hayeo jusoseo dangsin ui eunhyeloseo dangsin-ui seongsilhan jongdeul jung-ui han jong-i doege hasoseo
geuga saedeul-eul bulleomoa malha gil odisaega boiji anhneunde geudo yeogie oji anhneun ja jung-ui hanagaaninyo
geuga man-il bunmyeonghi oji a nihan iyuleul jesihaji anhneundamyeon eomhage daseulyeo geuleul jug-ilila
geuneun eolmadoeji anh-a dol-awa malhagil jeoneun dangsindeul-i moleuneun geos eul algo issseubnida sabalobuteo jung yohan sosig-eul dangsinkke gajyeowassseubnida
jeoneun geugos-eseo geudeul wie gunlimhago issneun han yeoseong-eul balgyeonhaessneun de geunyeoegeneun modeun geos-i iss-eossgo widaehan ogjwado gajigo issseubnida

jeoneun geunyeowa geunyeoui baegseongdeul i hananim oee taeyang-eul sungbaehago iss-eum-eul al-assseubnida satandeul-eun geudeul-ui haeng-wileul geuleoldeushage boyeo geudeul lo hayeogeum jinliui gil-eul beos-eonage haess-euni geudeul-eun jigeum indodoeji mos hago issseubnida
geudeul-eun olh-eun gil-eseo beos-eona haneulgwa ttang-wie gamchueojin geos-e bich eul bichusigo gamchuneun geosgwa deuleonae neun modeun geos-eul algogyesineun hananim eul gyeongbaehaji ani habnida
geubun-eun widaehan gwonjaui junim isin hananim-eulo geubun oeeneun sin i eobs-seubnida
sollomon-i malhagil nega sasil eul malhaessneunji animyeon geojismal-eul haess neunji ulineun alge doelila
naui i seosin-eul gajigo gaseogeudeul-ege jeonhago jamsi mom-eul sumgi eo geudeul-i mueola eungdabhaneunji gi dalyeo bola
geu yeowang-i malhagil jogjangdeul-a naege gogwihan han seosin-i wassnola
geugeos-eun sollomon-eulobuteo on geos-eulo da-eumgwa gat-eumae jabilousigo jaaelousin hananim-ui ileum-eulo
na-e daehanghayeo omanhaji mal go sunjonghayeo naegelo ola
